level.text: Each Expanded Child Development Home may be licensed to provide care for more than six (6) children, up to a maximum of twelve (12) children.
Each Expanded Child Development Home shall comply with all of the requirements of this Chapter pertaining to Child Development Homes, and with the following additional requirements:
Each Expanded Child Development Home shall have at least two Caregivers; and
Each Expanded Child Development Home shall provide a minimum of thirty-five square feet (35 ft2) of program space per child.
No Caregiver in an Expanded Child Development Home is permitted to provide foster care, for either children or adults, on the same premises, without the prior written approval of the Director.
